effect.name: Scale2x BG
effect.description: Upscale the screen to a higher resolution using a modified Scale2x upscaling algorithm. This version takes info from the background rather than the current layer. Special thanks to Salamanderpants for making this extension possible.
effect.author: Sebastian Janisz
effect.parameter: Subpixel offset X fSubPixelOffsetX Number of half-pixels to offset the output's X by. float // Type (int, float or int_float4) edit // Property type (EDIT, SLIDER, SPIN, CHECKBOX, COLOR) 0
